## UMAP plot highlighting FAPs

```{r}
DimPlot(
  LLC_combined,
  reduction = "umap",
  group.by = "seurat_clusters",
  cells.highlight = list("FAPs" = WhichCells(LLC_combined, expression = seurat_clusters == "FAPs")),
  sizes.highlight = 1,
  pt.size = 1,
  cols.highlight = "#92AA34" 
) +
  ggplot2::labs(title = "", x = "UMAP1", y = "UMAP2") +
  theme(
    axis.text.x = element_blank(),
    axis.text.y = element_blank(),
    axis.ticks = element_blank()) +

```



# Re-process cells

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs <- NormalizeData(LLC_FAPs) %>%
  FindVariableFeatures() %>%
  ScaleData(features = all_genes) %>%
  RunPCA(npcs = 50)
```

```{r}
ElbowPlot(LLC_FAPs, ndims = 50)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs <- FindNeighbors(LLC_FAPs, dims = 1:35) %>%
  FindClusters(resolution = 0.3)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
Idents(LLC_FAPs) <- "seurat_clusters"

LLC_FAPs <- RunUMAP(LLC_FAPs, reduction = "pca", dims = 1:35)
```



# Annotate subclusters

```{r, include=FALSE}
DefaultAssay(LLC_FAPs) <- "RNA"

Idents(LLC_FAPs) <- LLC_FAPs$seurat_clusters
LLC_FAPs <- JoinLayers(LLC_FAPs, what = "all")
DEGs_LLC_FAPs_subclusters <- FindAllMarkers(object = LLC_FAPs, group.by = "seurat_clusters", test.use = "LR", only.pos = TRUE, min.pct = 0.25, logfc.threshold = 0.25)
```


## Specify subclusters

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs_cluster_ids <- levels(LLC_FAPs$seurat_clusters)

LLC_FAPs_cluster_labels <- c("Stem", "Pro-remodeling", "Tenocytes", "Transitional", "Transitional", "Pro-remodeling", "Dlk1+", "Tenm2+")

LLC_FAPs_clusters <- LLC_FAPs@meta.data$seurat_clusters

LLC_FAPs$seurat_clusters <- LLC_FAPs_cluster_labels[LLC_FAPs$seurat_clusters]

```


## Order conditions

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs$orig.ident <- factor(LLC_FAPs$orig.ident, levels = c("Sham", "2_weeks", "2.5_weeks", "3.5_weeks"))
```


## Order subclusters

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs$seurat_clusters <- factor(LLC_FAPs$seurat_clusters, levels = c("Stem", "Transitional", "Pro-remodeling", "Dlk1+", "Tenm2+", "Tenocytes"))
```


## Run FindAllMarkers again

```{r, include=FALSE}
DefaultAssay(LLC_FAPs) <- "RNA"

Idents(LLC_FAPs) <- LLC_FAPs$seurat_clusters
LLC_FAPs <- JoinLayers(LLC_FAPs, what = "all")
DEGs_LLC_FAPs_subclusters <- FindAllMarkers(object = LLC_FAPs, group.by = "seurat_clusters", test.use = "LR", only.pos = TRUE, min.pct = 0.25, logfc.threshold = 0.25)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
write.csv(DEGs_LLC_FAPs_subclusters, file = "DEGs_LLC_FAPs_subclusters.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

## Plot stacked barplot for subcluster proportions

### Extract the proportions from the FAPs Seurat object
```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs_cluster_proportions <- LLC_FAPs@meta.data %>%
  dplyr::select(orig.ident, seurat_clusters) %>%
  group_by(orig.ident, seurat_clusters) %>%
  summarize(count = n()) %>%
  group_by(orig.ident) %>%
  mutate(percentage = count / sum(count) * 100)
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
write.csv(LLC_FAPs_cluster_proportions, file = "LLC_FAPs_cluster_proportions.csv", row.names = TRUE)
```


```{r}
LLC_FAPs_cluster_proportions$orig.ident <- factor(
  LLC_FAPs_cluster_proportions$orig.ident,
  levels = c("Sham", "2_weeks", "2.5_weeks", "3.5_weeks"),
  labels = c("Sham", "2 weeks", "2.5 weeks", "3.5 weeks"))

ggplot(LLC_FAPs_cluster_proportions, aes(x = orig.ident, y = percentage, fill = seurat_clusters)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity", width = 0.75, color = "black") +
  scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format(scale = 1), expand = c(0, 0)) +
  labs(title = "", x = "", y = "Proportion") +
  theme(legend.position = "right", panel.background = element_blank(), axis.line = element_line(color = "black"), axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1)) +
  guides(fill = guide_legend(title = NULL))
```

# Pseudotime

## Convert seurat_object to cell_data_set

```{r, include=FALSE}
Idents(LLC_FAPs) <- "seurat_clusters"

LLC_FAPs_cds <- as.cell_data_set(LLC_FAPs)
fData(LLC_FAPs_cds)$gene_short_name <- rownames(fData(LLC_FAPs_cds))
```


## Assign partitions

```{r, include=FALSE}
recreate.partition <- c(rep(1, length(LLC_FAPs_cds@colData@rownames)))
names(recreate.partition) <- LLC_FAPs_cds@colData@rownames
recreate.partition <- as.factor(recreate.partition)

LLC_FAPs_cds@clusters$UMAP$partitions <- recreate.partition
```


## Assign cluster information

```{r, include=FALSE}
list_LLC_FAPs_clusters <- LLC_FAPs@active.ident
LLC_FAPs_cds@clusters$UMAP$clusters <- list_LLC_FAPs_clusters
```


## Assign UMAP coordinate - cell embedding

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs_cds@int_colData@listData$reducedDims$UMAP <- LLC_FAPs@reductions$umap@cell.embeddings
```


## Order cells in pseudotime

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs_cds <- learn_graph(LLC_FAPs_cds, use_partition = FALSE)

cluster_assignments <- LLC_FAPs_cds@clusters$UMAP$clusters

root_cells <- names(cluster_assignments[cluster_assignments == "Stem"])

LLC_FAPs_cds <- order_cells(LLC_FAPs_cds, reduction_method = "UMAP", root_cells = root_cells)
```


## Add pseudotime to metadata

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs_cds$monocle3_pseudotime <- pseudotime(LLC_FAPs_cds)
```


## Create file with pseudotime values

```{r, include=FALSE}
LLC_FAPs_pseudotime_data <- as.data.frame(colData(LLC_FAPs_cds))
```

```{r, include=FALSE}
write.csv(LLC_FAPs_pseudotime_data, file = "LLC_FAPs_pseudotime_data.csv", row.names = TRUE)
```


## Plot in pseudotime

```{r}
plot_cells(LLC_FAPs_cds, color_cells_by = "pseudotime", 
           label_branch_points = FALSE, 
           label_roots = FALSE,
           label_leaves = FALSE,
           group_label_size = 3,
           cell_size = 1.5,
           trajectory_graph_color = "green") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_blank(), axis.text.y = element_blank(), axis.ticks = element_blank())
```


## Check pseudotime values by clusters ("check" to see that the early cells are indeed at a lower pseudotime than the later differentiated)

```{r}
ggplot(LLC_FAPs_pseudotime_data, aes(monocle3_pseudotime, seurat_clusters, fill = seurat_clusters)) +
  geom_boxplot(show.legend = FALSE) +
  labs(x = "Pseudotime", y = NULL) +
  theme_classic()
```
